paper_abstract: We consider the m parallel-machine scheduling problem that process service requests from various customers who are entitled to different levels of grade of service (GoS). The objective is to minimize the makespan. We give a fully polynomial-time approximation scheme for the case where m is fixed. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An FPTAS for parallel-machine scheduling under a grade of service provision to minimize makespan
